content.div:
Come to the leading PHP Conference in Latin America!
The 12th edition of PhpConference Brasil will happen between December 6th (Wednesday) and December 10th (Sunday).
The last event day will be reserved for participants to rest and improve their networking.
This year we'll have hands-on courses (8-hour duration each), practical mini-courses (4-hour duration each), talks and keynotes.
The event venue provides us a camping area, so you can come and stay all night long.
Come to learn about PHP and improve your networking! More information at www.phpconference.com.br.
